agent_response: Ruby: Hi there! 🌟 I’m glad the tips were helpful. As you adjust your schedule, I’ll keep an eye on your calendar and nudging you with gentle reminders a day before each key milestone—flight check‑in, hotel arrival, and any pre‑departure appointments. Also, if you need a quick rundown of local transport options or want to lock in a pickup time, just let me know. I’ll ensure everything is aligned so you can enjoy a smooth, stress‑free journey. Safe travels! ✈️
